string.value: I should go visit Mr. Shim in Folk Town. I heard he hasn't been doing well lately...

At the Korean Folk Town, I met with #b#p2071009##k, who's a loving father to his only daughter, Shim Chung. Lately, however, he's been worried that his eyesight is rapidly failing him, and that he was worried he might one day become blind. He wanted to buy a pair of Reading Glasses, but the astronomical price tag calls for #b300 #t4031279#s#k per pair, he wanted to borrow them from me. How am I going to find #t4031279#, though?
Ahh, Mr. Shim said I can find it through #r#o3210208##k at #bHelios Tower#k... 

#t4031279# #b#c4031279##k / 300

I ran into #p2071009#, who was concerned about his rapidly failing eyesight, at Korean Folk Town. After hearing his story, I promised to lend him 300 #t4031279#s. The problem is, I don't have any rice ... but thankfully, after gettin #o3210208#, I was able to get 300 #t4031279#s. As a sign of thanks, #p2071009# gave me #t4031280#.

How can I help you? My name is Cantsee Shim, or #p2071009# for short. I live here in Korean Folk Town and I live with my beautiful daughter Shim Chung, my precious only child. Have you seen her by any chance? She has been busy going to places, and I haven't seen her in a while. I am worried about her whereabouts. Where could she be ...\r\n#L0##bDo you want me to help you find her?\r\n#L1#Mr. Cantsee Shim ... so are you completely blind?#k

No. My last name is 'Shim', and my name is 'Cantsee', but it's just the name, nothing else. Believe me, people always inquire about it, and that's why I just go by Mr. Shim. As I have gotten older, however, I am legitimately concerned about my rapidly declining eye sight. \r\n#L0##bHow about trying on a pair of glasses? #k

Yes. I also went to the market a while ago, and I heard of this new item called the 'Reading Glasses'. The merchant told me this item is for everyone who has grown old and whose eye sight is slowly declining, struggling to see what's right in front. I mean, this item is just perfect for me! After finding out the price, though, I was devastated. \r\n#L0##bHow much was it? #k

I don't know why it's so expensive... I mean, #b300 #t4031279#s#k? Our family has been struggling to put food on the table, so that price tag is definitely too overwhelming. I can't let my daughter know of this, because this will greatly upset her; she's just a pure angel, she does not want to see her daddy struggle like this. Because of that, I haven't told her of this.\r\n#L0##bWell, then forget about it.\r\n#L1#May I help you in this?#k
Really? Are you really going to help me out?
No. She should be back soon. She's not one to ever leave me alone for too long... I wonder where my dear Shim Chung is... Chung~ Chung!

Yes, that's probably what's going to happen. Who in the right state of mind will lend a guy like me #b300 #t4031279#s#k, not knowing when I can fully pay that person back? I'm just worried that, with my eye sight deteriorating by the minute, I am afraid I may indeed become blind soon.

Thank you so much. Honestly, I'm scared these days. I'm scared of losing my eye sight to the point of becoming completely blind. If you can lend me #b300 #t4031279#s#k, then I'll make sure I'll help you on your journey down the road. By the way, do you really have that much rice to begin with?

If you're lacking, I suggest you visit the #bHelios Tower#k. I heard that at Helios Tower, you can obtain #t4031279# through #r#o3210208##k. I know I should be helping you out here, but my eyes have failed me and I don't think I can be able to locate the fast-running #o3210208#, nevermind catching it. I know this is a lot to ask, but please help me. Please lend me #b300 #t4031279#s#k.\n\n#i4031279# #b300#k #t4031279#s

So you made me pour my heart out, only for you to say no at the end? You're despicable ... I'm really a man in need, and I am afraid I may go totally blind if I don't do something about it really soon... and for you to crack a joke at my expense... that's just really disappointing.

Is this really ... no, it IS indeed #b300 #t4031279#s#k. I don't think I have ever seen a collection of rice this big. I can't believe you're actually lending out this much to me. I ... I really don't know what to say. Thank you, thank you and thank you... how can I repay you for your good deed?

Honestly, I have no idea how long it'll take for me to pay you back 300 #t4031279#s, so instead of that, I'll give you this book that has been our family treasure for generations. I want to personally thank you for helping us out. Please take it.

Do you still need time to gather up #b300 #t4031279#s#k? Is there a way you can get them to me a little faster? Apparently, the merchants that are selling the Reading Glasses are about to leave soon, and I need to buy them before it's too late.
